name: Rolling Thunder (itch)
description:
Still On Development.. 

This is a game I have been working on for a while now, and I could really use some feedback, 

Control 

  • Just Click And Drag player
  •  Player to Jump to target or finish line object (sorry demo)
  •  Avoid any Obstacle and Enemy
  • There Level Boss too

I really, really appreciate it if anyone tried this game and provided some feedback. What do you guys think? All thoughts are very much welcome, from nitpicking to the bigger picture, and if you have any question, by all means: ask them.

Thanks in advance!
